title: What screams I am into ISKCON? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all you should ask as in what way this so-called ISKCON happens to help you comprehend or understand your PROBLEMS? If it does and if that's relevant, then you could ask further questions, otherwise just treat this so called ISKCON as the Propaganda Power Game of certain MEGALOMANIAC people. Ashok Nanotkar. India.
